messages.subject: MESSAGE FOR YOU
messages.body:
Home Address:No 24A Idrisa
Road,Kabul,Afghanistan

DEAR SIR,

Greetings in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, I am
former Mrs.Linder Aguh , now SARAH SIETA AFTER
BAPTISIM a widow to Late Sheik Mohammed Setia, I am 74years old,I am now a new
Christian convert,suffering from long time cancer of the breast. From all
indications my condition is really deteriorating and it's quite obvious that I won't
live more than six months according to my doctors.

This is because the cancer stage has gotten to a very
bad stage.My late husband was killed during the US raid against terrorism in
Afghanistan, and during the period of our marriage we couldn't produce any child. My
late husband was very wealthy and after his death,I inherited all his business and
wealth. The doctor has advised me that I! ! may not live for more than six months,
so I now decided to divide part of this wealth, to contribute to the development of
the church in Africa, America, Asia and Europe.

I selected you after visiting the website and I prayed
over it, I am willing to donate the sum of $10.000,000.00 Million Us
Dollars to you for the less privileged. Please I want you to note that, this fund is
lying in a Security Company and upon my instuction, my attorney, who presenlty is in
Africa distributing relief materials to victims of bomb blast in COTE D' VOUIR;

For your interest in doing this corporal work of
mercy, before you distribute this money, you will take 15% of the
money.

Lastly, I honestly pray that this money when
transferred will be used for the said purpose, because I have come to find out that
wealth acquisition without Christ is vanity upon! ! vanity.

May the Grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, the love of
God, and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you and your family.

I await your urgent reply.

Yours in Christ.
MRS SARAH

CONTACT ME THROUGH THIS EMAIL ADDRESS:

sarah_sieta@---
messages.raw:
Whats the Bloody Point?
Scam 5
Email 1
< previous     next >     index
Opening Email

Slightly different. She's dying of cancer and wants to give all her money away.

< previous     next >     index

messages.subject: MESSAGE FOR YOU
messages.body:
MRS SARAH

This is truly a wonderful gesture.

Funny, only just this morning I found out that the Church roof will cost £500,000 to
renovate. Also Mrs Donkeykong, my good friend, informs me that she desperately needs
a new car.

So you email came at exactly the right time and so I'm certain it is a sign from our
Heavenly Father. You will be pleased, I am sure, that this money will be going to
assist in the Lord's work.

I look forward to hearing back from you.

Rev. Wally Tightnuts
messages.raw:
Whats the Bloody Point?
Scam 5
Email 2
< previous     next >     index
Enter Rev. Wally Tightnuts

Used this reply in Scam 4 as well
Poor Mrs Donkeykong

messages.subject: FILL THE FORM AND SUBMIT IT TO THE PAYING BANK FOR APPROVALS AND IMMEDIATE PAYMENT
messages.body:
ATTN:  Rev. Wally Tightnuts

I AM BARRISTER MBEKI  ALPHONSE  A CHARITY ATTORNEY TO MRS SETIA

I WAS DIRECTED TO CONTACT YOU WITH THIS FORM AND LETTER OF AUTHORITY AND DIRECTIVES
BELOW BY A PHILANTROPIST MRS CHRISTIANA SETIA WHO HAPPENS TO BE MY CLIENT ON HER
HOSPITAL BED ALL NECCESARY ARRANGEMENT HAS BEEN PUT IN PLACE FOR THE IMMEDIATE
TRANSFER OF THIS WILLED FUND TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT HENCE I AM PRESENTLY IN
SIERRA-LEONE,I HAVE  CONTACTED THE BANK WHERE THIS FUND IS PRESENTLY DEPOSITED

THIS FUND   WAS DEPOSITED TO PREMIUM SECURITY AND VAULT SERVICES IN HOLLAND  BY MRS
SETIA. UPON THE RECEIPT OF THE FILLED FORM FROM YOU, I WILL ADVISE THE LODGEMENT
BANK TO APPROVE AND TRANSFER THE  US10 MILLION TO YOUR NOMINATED BANK ACCOUNT FOR
DISBURSEMENT ACCORDING TO HER PROMISE TO GOD THROUGH YOU.AS SOON AS YOU FILL THIS
TEXT OF FORM WITH THE TEXT OF APPLICATION BELOW AND SEND TO THE LODGEMENT BANK FOR
IMMEDIATE APPROVAL IN YOUR NAME AND FAVOUR GET BACK TO ME FOR MORE DIRECTIVES, HENCE
I ASSURE YOU THAT IF YOU CAN FOLLOW UP MY DIRECTIVES THIS FUND WILL BE IN YOUR
DESIGNATED BANK ACCOUNT UNDER 7 WORKING DAYS.
YOU ARE HEREBY REQUESTED TO FILL THIS FORM AND THE TEXT OF APPILICATION AND SEND
THEM TO THIS
PREMIUM SECURITY AND VAULT SERVICES IN HOLLAND   E-MAIL ADDRESS:
premiumbank_vault@yahoo.com FILL THIS FORM NOW
ACCOMPANY IT WITH THE TEXT OF APPLICATION AND SEND
THEM TO THE LODGEMENT  BANK FOR THE IMMEDIATE
APPROVAL AND TRANSFER OF THIS FUND IN YOUR NAME AND FAVOUR FOR IMMEDIATE TRANSFER TO
YOUR DESIGNATED  BANK ACCOUNT AS SOON AS YOU APPLY TO THE BANK GET BACK TO ME FOR
MORE  DIRECTIVES.

YOURS FAITHFULLY,
BARRISTER MBEKI ALPHONSE Esq

HERE IS THE TEXT OF APPLICATION FORM, FILL AND MAKE REFRENCE TO MR. VAN DYKE, HIS IS
THE PAYMENT OFFICER
................................................................................................


Sir,
I MR ....ADDRESS..... HUMBLY WRITE/APPLY FOR THE
APPROVAL AND TRANSFER OF MY
INHERITED FUND AMOUNTING US$10, 000 000 TO MY
NORMINATED BANK ACCOUNT IN
.........
I WILL APPRICIATE IF YOU CAN HUMBLY CONSIDER MY
APPLICATION FOR IMMEDIATE
APPROVAL AND TRANSFER OF MY FUND TO MY NORMINATED
BANK
ACCOUNT,

YOURS




HERE IS THE CLAIM FORM

NAME OF CLAIMANT:......
AMOUNT CLAIMED:.......
REGISTERED ADDRESS:.......
CITY ADDRESS:......
TELEPHONE:......
FAX......
SOCIAL STATUS OF OF CLAIMANT:.....
RECEIVING BANK:......
ACCOUNT NUMBER:....
NAME OF ACCOUNT BENEFICIARY:......
NEXT OF KIN:......
SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER:........
OCCUPATION............
IN CASE OF ANY QUESTION DO NOT HESISTATE TO ASK.
RGDS,
ALPHONSE MBEKI
comments:
After receiving this one I had his account closed and that of
the premium security company mentioned in the email too.
Adds a bit of fun.

messages.subject: MY CHARITY LAWYER WILLCONTACT YOU AS SOON AS POSSIBLE
messages.body:
Dear  Rev. Wally Tightnuts

Blessings in the name of our lord jesus christ.

I prayed that God will keep
you, abide you to let you help in the humanitarian
aid in your country,well I could have written to you but why I do not write to you
was that I am very
down in sickness of the moment.

I have directed my charity arthorney( Alphonse Mbeki) that will help you get the
important documents to enable the bank transfer the fund into your nominated bank
account.

I have given him your particulars he will contact
you as soon as possible.I will want you to always be in prayers.his name is
Barrister Alphonse williams and he
will get to you as soon as posible.
may God bless you always and your family as you do
his work.

Your's in Christ

Mrs Sarah Sieta
messages.raw:
Whats the Bloody Point?
Scam 5
Email 4

messages.subject: Your Form
messages.body:
Mr Mbeki,

My child, I do indeed have your emails and wish to proceed with this good work but
your habit of writing everything in CAPITALS is most disconcerting. And there really
are many words in your emails.

I wonder if you would be so kind as to either give my a simply short summary of what
is required or better still telephone me on +44 70 xxxx xxxx (that's +44 for the UK)
comments:
This was sent two hours before I had his account closed
so he probably didn't see it.

messages.subject: Oh Dear
messages.body:
Mrs Sieta, My child,

I hope this email finds you in good spirits and I hope the cancer is not eating away
at you at too fast a rate because that can get really nasty. I saw it happen to my
poodle and it wasn't nice I must tell you. When you start coughing up blood that is
when you really know you've had it. I pray your coughing up blood day is still many
days away. Let's at least try to get this transaction finished.

I write to let you know that you lawer's account has been cut off. This seems
strange to me.

The last email I tried to send him was as follows:

Mr Mbeki,

My child, I do indeed have your emails and wish to proceed with this good work but
your habit of writing everything in CAPITALS is most disconcerting. And there really
are many words in your emails.

I wonder if you would be so kind as to either give me a simple short summary of what
is required or better still telephone me on +44 70 xxxx xxxx (that's +44 for the UK)
messages.raw:
Whats the Bloody Point?
Scam 5
Email 6
< previous     next >     index
Hope you are not coughing up blood yet.

To: sarahsieta
Date: Sun 18/05/2003 22:52
Subject: Oh Dear

Mrs Sieta, My child,

I hope this email finds you in good spirits and I hope the cancer is not eating away
at you at too fast a rate because that can get really nasty. I saw it happen to my
poodle and it wasn't nice I must tell you. When you start coughing up blood that is
when you really know you've had it. I pray your coughing up blood day is still many
days away. Let's at least try to get this transaction finished.

I write to let you know that you lawer's account has been cut off. This seems
strange to me.

The last email I tried to send him was as follows:

Mr Mbeki,

My child, I do indeed have your emails and wish to proceed with this good work but
your habit of writing everything in CAPITALS is most disconcerting. And there really
are many words in your emails.

I wonder if you would be so kind as to either give me a simple short summary of what
is required or better still telephone me on +44 70 xxxx xxxx (that's +44 for the UK)

messages.subject: Your Lawyer
messages.body:
My Child,

I hope you are still fighting your imminent demise. You will be pleased to hear that
we have been praying that you will stay alive for some days longer so that we can at
least conclude this transaction.

Your lawyer does not answer his emails.

Have him ring me on +44 70 xxxx xxxx (that's +44 for the UK). Tell him that he must
shout in to the phone for quite some time when the message comes on so that I will
hear him through the speakers and pick up.

I look forward to speaking with him.

Rev. Wally Tightnuts

Whats the Bloody Point?

messages.subject: Your Lawyer
messages.body:
My Dear Child

You have not responded to my email and your Lawyer is useless as he has not phoned
me. I suggest you change lawyers. This one is so slow that you may be dead before I
get your money.

I await your reply.
